name: Misión Triple R
summary: This game, which was given away to various schools, aims to teach kids from Málaga about the importance of taking care and respecting their environment. The game mostly consists of trivia questions about variosu general areas of the province of Málaga, like the city or the mountain. Every couple of questions the game will present the player with a minigame like matching cards or racing on foot to a location. The objective of the game is to beat it in under 40 minutes, which done correctly would allow the player to enter a contest.
